# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/d3`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for d3JS (http://d3js.org/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/d3/v3

Additional Details

 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: d3
